devdoc.details: The vesting vault contract for the initial token sale

params.amount: The amount of tokens being granted
params.recipient: The address that is receiving the grant
params.startTime: The unix timestamp when the grant will start
params.vestingCliffInDays: The vesting cliff duration in days

calculateGrantClaim(address).details: Due to rounding errors once grant duration is reached, returns the entire left grant amountReturns 0 if cliff has not been reached

params.recipient: The address that has a grant

claimVestedTokens(address).details: Errors if no tokens have vestedIt is advised recipients check they are entitled to claim via `calculateGrantClaim` before calling this

params.recipient: The address that has a grant
The address that has a grant

returns._0: the number of claimed tokens by `recipient`

params.recipient: The address that has a grant
The address that has a grant

returns._0: Number of tokens that will vest per day

vestedBalance(address).details: Returns 0 if cliff has not been reached

params.recipient: The address that has a grant

SECONDS_PER_DAY.details: Used to translate vesting periods specified in days to seconds

devdoc.title: Vesting

ChangedOwner(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the owner of the vesting contract is updated

ChangedVotingPower(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the voting power contract referenced by the vesting contract is updated

GrantAdded(address,uint256,uint256,uint1.notice: Event emitted when a new grant is created

GrantTokensClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when tokens are claimed by a recipient from a grant

calculateGrantClaim(address).notice: Calculate the vested and unclaimed tokens available for `recipient` to claim

claimVestedTokens(address).notice: Allows a grant recipient to claim their vested tokens

tokenGrants(address).notice: Mapping of recipient address > token grant

tokensVestedPerDay(address).notice: Calculate the number of tokens that will vest per day for the given recipient

vestedBalance(address).notice: Calculate the vested (claimed + unclaimed) tokens for `recipient`
